azurerm_monitor_metric_alert.description: Manages a Metric Alert within Azure Monitor

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Metric Alert instance.

scopes.description: A set of strings of resource IDs at which the metric criteria should be applied.

criteria.description: One or more `criteria` blocks as defined below.

action.description: One or more `action` blocks as defined below.

enabled.description: Should this Metric Alert be enabled? Defaults to `true`.

auto_mitigate.description: Should the alerts in this Metric Alert be auto resolved? Defaults to `true`.

description.description: The description of this Metric Alert.

frequency.description: The evaluation frequency of this Metric Alert, represented in ISO 8601 duration format. Possible values are `PT1M`, `PT5M`, `PT15M`, `PT30M` and `PT1H`. Defaults to `PT1M`.

severity.description: The severity of this Metric Alert. Possible values are `0`, `1`, `2`, `3` and `4`. Defaults to `3`.

window_size.description: The period of time that is used to monitor alert activity, represented in ISO 8601 duration format. This value must be greater than `frequency`. Possible values are `PT1M`, `PT5M`, `PT15M`, `PT30M`, `PT1H`, `PT6H`, `PT12H` and `P1D`. Defaults to `PT5M`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

action_group_id.description: The ID of the Action Group can be sourced from [the `azurerm_monitor_action_group` resource](./monitor_action_group.html)

webhook_properties.description: The map of custom string properties to include with the post operation. These data are appended to the webhook payload.

metric_namespace.description: One of the metric namespaces to be monitored.

metric_name.description: One of the metric names to be monitored.

aggregation.description: The statistic that runs over the metric values. Possible values are `Average`, `Count`, `Minimum`, `Maximum` and `Total`.

operator.description: The dimension operator. Possible values are `Include` and `Exclude`.

threshold.description: The criteria threshold value that activates the alert.

dimension.description: One or more `dimension` blocks as defined below.

id.description: The ID of the metric alert.

create.description: Used when creating the Metric Alert.

update.description: Used when updating the Metric Alert.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Metric Alert.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Metric Alert.
